resources.string:
ADD: select a chess symbol from the images below the board and touch one or more target fields on board.

DELETE: touch the trash icon and then touch one or more chess symbols on board.

MOVE: drag and drop on board.

ACTIVE COLOR: touch the icon below the trash icon for changing the active color.

BOARD Button: a menu appears and offers you the following possibilities:
* clear board
* last current position
* the standard chess position
* create a manual Chess960 position
* create a random Chess960 position
* enter a Chess960 ID

FEN Button: a menu appears and you can change the following FEN values(for professionals only):
* active color
* castling availability
* en passant target square
* halfmove clock
* fullmove number
